title: EliseAI Releases Complete Next-Gen AI Solution to Revolutionize Leasing to Resident Journey
author: Minna Song
summary: EliseAI announces the launch of its next-generation AI platform designed to transform the leasing to resident journey, enhancing operations and improving resident satisfaction.
main_content:
# EliseAI Releases Complete Next-Gen AI Solution to Revolutionize Leasing to Resident Journey

Today we're excited to announce the launch of our next-generation complete AI platform to all existing and new customers. Our platform serves over 60% of the top 50 real estate operators and has had more than 30 million conversations with prospects and residents. EliseAI enables operators to take AI from buzzword to practice, using our technology to revolutionize operations, make employees more effective, improve resident satisfaction, and drive operating results.

---

### Our next-gen platform offers the only complete AI solution on the market:

---

- Industry leading AI comprehension, privacy, and security based on proprietary technology and more than 30 million conversations
- Generative conversational AI across the entire consumer journey, from prospect to move-in to resident
- Covers all methods of prospect and resident communication, meeting consumers everywhere they are - Email, SMS, Webchat, and Voice
- Serves all communities and operating models - multifamily, single-family, centralized operations, scattered sites, student housing, affordable housing, and more
- Speaks English, Spanish, Mandarin, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, and Polish, with more to come
- Integrates with all major industry systems to ensure seamless data exchange and operations
- Works with all leads and residents consistently, regardless of source

---

Seven years ago we revolutionized the industry with the launch of LeasingAI, and since then we have consistently led the industry in AI reach and product innovation.

---

"We're proud to be at the forefront of innovation in real estate," said Minna Song, CEO of EliseAI. "Our next-generation AI solution is designed to future-proof operations for our clients, enabling them to stay ahead of the curve and deliver exceptional experiences for their prospects and residents, all while driving greater efficiency and cost savings."

---

### Specific product innovations that are part of the next-generation platform include:

---

- ResidentAI suite, which proactively engages with residents and answers their questions across all channels, revolutionizing operations and workflows for Maintenance, Renewals, Delinquencies, and general resident requests
- Expansion of our leading VoiceAI technology, first announced last year, across the full journey from prospect to resident and covering the most common non-English languages used, increasing conversion rates and accessibility
- Comprehensive support for the Centralization of management, communication, and processes across multiple properties, including specialization of roles, ensuring that every task is managed by the most appropriate function and with maximum efficiency
- Complete 360 degree view of the prospect-to-resident journey, enabling new insights to enhance customer satisfaction and retention
- Customizable AI personality to reflect a property management company's unique brand

---

We're excited about the continued advancements in AI and our technology as we lead the deployment of AI within the real estate industry. To learn more about the platform or see a demo, contact sales@eliseai.com.
